Sentencas: This paper investigates the environmental and economic impacts of hydrogen-powered ferries in inland passenger and car transportation using Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) and Life Cycle Cost Analysis (LCCA).
Titulo: Environmental and economic assessment of hydrogen-powered ferries for inland transportation

Sentencas: Three types of electrolysers and two types of fuel cells, focusing on their manufacturing locations, are compared with two Marine Diesel Oils (MDOs) with various sulphur percentages.
Titulo: Environmental and economic assessment of hydrogen-powered ferries for inland transportation

Sentencas: In addition, this study utilises the Analytical Hierarchy Process (AHP) to weigh and rank the environmental impacts of all power options based on expert opinions.
Titulo: Environmental and economic assessment of hydrogen-powered ferries for inland transportation

Sentencas: As a result of the combination of LCA and AHP analysis, the most environmentally friendly power option is found to be the Solid Oxide Electrolyser-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell system for the case study, while the worst option is the Proton Exchange Membrane Electrolyser- Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell system.
Titulo: Environmental and economic assessment of hydrogen-powered ferries for inland transportation

Sentencas: Moreover, MDOs are the most cost-effective power options in all carbon-tax scenarios.
Titulo: Environmental and economic assessment of hydrogen-powered ferries for inland transportation
